item.title: Convert a pdf file to a text file with pdftotext
item.description: Today I was asked whether I was aware of a way to extract a table from a pdf file. I actually knew about one CLI tool pdftotext ðŸ”— that converts a pdf file to a text file and I had this memory that I had used it for tables in the past. pdftotext is developed by Glyph & Cog with several other CLI tools to manipulate pdf files and the pdf viewer Xpdf.
